Son Juwon

Korean: 손주원

Hometown:

Dasan-dong, Namyangju, Gyeonggi-do

Country:

South Korea

Full name:
Son Ju Won
Native name:
손주원
Birthday:
Sep 16, 2006
Age:
18 years old

Introduction

Son Juwon is a South Korean trainee under H1GHR MUSIC. She is a member of the agency's upcoming girl group along three others I-LAND2: N/a contestants.

In 2024, she was a contestant on Mnet's survival show I-LAND2: N/a, where she was sadly eliminated in episode 10. At that time, she was a trainee under WAKEONE.

H1GHR MUSIC:

Fun facts

1
Son Juwon's hashtags for I-LAND2: N/a were #HanlimHighPracticalDance and #FeelsLikeITurnedIntoSONJUWON♬.
…
2
Son Juwon wanted to become an idol because she had liked to dance and sing in front of many people since she was young. She thought she could stand on stage to show her talent and charm by becoming an idol.
…
3
Son Juwon was classmates with Park Ji Hoo of EVNNE.

Son Juwon's motto for I-LAND2: N/a was "Now your world will be divided into before and after knowing SON JUWON."

Son Juwon's favorite color is yellow.

Son Juwon's N/a #keyword were: Keyring Lover, Positive Mind, Dance, and Yellow.

Son Juwon's special abilities are slapstick and acrobatic.
